articles.title: Top Beauty Trends and Styles of the Week: Unveiling the Best Looks
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: The beauty industry sees a return to the 'clean girl' aesthetic emphasizing healthy skin achieved with products like hyaluronic acid serums and BB creams. Bold lip colors are trending, paired with minimal eye makeup, featuring long-lasting matte lipsticks. Graphic eyeliner is also gaining popularity, with individuals experimenting with shapes and colors using fine-tipped liquid and gel liners.

articles.title: Why PR isn't optional for African start-ups
articles.author: Loth Makuza
articles.summary: Start-ups like Rifaly, Adflow Africa and Winvo will pitch their ideas to the world at the Zanzibar Innovation Day hosted by the Indian Institute of Technology Madras Zanzibar from October 3 to 5. The event aims to connect Africa's entrepreneurial energy with India's deep-tech expertise, offering visibility and credibility through PR.

articles.title: The alternative that changes habits in the bathroom and that is already a worldwide trend
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Smart toilets, pioneered by TOTO's Washlet, are gaining global popularity as a cleaner, more sustainable alternative to traditional toilet paper. These toilets feature adjustable warm water cleansing, air dryers, heated seats, and automatic flushing. The adoption of smart toilets is accelerating due to the enhanced hygiene, skin-friendly comfort, reduced environmental impact, and potential long-term savings.

articles.title: **Guidance for EEA and UK Customers: Yahoo! JAPAN Content Writing Services**
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Archyde.com offers Yahoo! JAPAN content writing services tailored for EEA and UK businesses, focusing on delivering culturally appropriate content. The company provides services such as Japanese keyword research, localization, website content, blog posts, and product descriptions optimized for Yahoo! JAPAN's platform. Their content creation process includes briefing and consultation, keyword research and strategy, content creation by native Japanese writers, review and editing, and delivery and feedback.

articles.title: 40 Fall Must-Haves For Millennials And Gen X
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several new products designed for comfort and relaxation are introduced. These include an electric gooseneck kettle similar to the Fellow Stagg kettle with temperature presets, a sunrise alarm clock similar to the Hatch alarm clock simulating sunrise and functioning as a night-light, and a plush blanket comparable to the Barefoot Dreams one that reviewers have said is similar. Other new products include a two-wick pumpkin chai candle similar to the Voluspa candle, and a Java Sok.

articles.title: I'm Happy To Show You These 37 Amazing Products
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Maybelline launched Lifter Glaze Oil Balm, a moisturizing and low-maintenance color balm containing a hydrating oil blend and hyaluronic acid. NeeDoh introduced Groovy Jewel, a new fidget toy. Dawn released Apple Powerwash Spray, a seasonal version of their dish soap, featuring an upgraded nozzle for grease cutting.

articles.title: Could AI-powered surveillance cameras keep your home safe?
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Ring has launched new 4K cameras, including the Wired Video Doorbell Pro, Outdoor Camera Pro, Spotlight Camera Pro, and Floodlight Camera Pro, featuring 'Retinal Vision' and AI-powered customization. The Ring app is receiving an update with generative AI to describe camera views in notifications. Blink introduced a new $90 doorbell and the $60 Blink Mini 2K+ camera.

articles.title: Limited Time Offer: Domain Hosting Order Software + Template for Resellers
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is launching its domain name and web hosting ordering PHP software, designed for domain and hosting resellers. The software offers features such as domain availability checker with WHOIS, RDAP, DNS, Registrar API, multi-TLD search and an AI domain suggestion tool.

articles.title: 39 Products That'll Help Your Skin, Hair, Or Nails
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream which contains salicylic acid. Elizavecca launched hair treatment with ceramides and collagen. Good Molecules has launched Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Denman has launched a Hair Brush with a multifunctional design. Skala launched Mais Cacho Hair 2-in-1 Conditioning Treatment. Anua launched a pore-clearing cleansing oil. Mixsoon launched Bean Essence, which works as an exfoliating rinse-off treatment and hydrating leave-on serum. CND Essentials launched nail and cuticle oil . Ogx launched air-dry leave-in cream. Lottabody launched super fluffy mousse for super-defined curls. Nivea launched a lightweight gel-cream which uses the magic of an ingredient called ~Q10~. Sally Hansen launched Instant Cuticle Remover gel. Anua launched 10% niacinamide serum. Maybelline launched Dark Circles Treatment Concealer. Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash. TruSkin Naturals launched Vitamin C Serum. Ebin New York launched a 24-hour edge tamer. Mise En ScÃ©ne launched a hair serum made with seven nourishing oils. Biodance launched Real Deep sheet mask. Color Wow launched One-Minute Transformation cream. Cosrx launched a hydrating repairing essence. TGIN launched miracle hair mask. Cure by Toya launched Aqua Gel Gentle Exfoliator. Pantene launched Pro-Vitamin Essence.

articles.title: Elizabeth Taylor's â€˜Lifetime Staple' for Getting Smooth Skin Is a Moisturizer With Over 17K 5-Star Reviews â€” $7 Today Only
articles.author: Julia Teti
articles.summary: Jergens is promoting its Original Lotion, highlighting its moisture-rich hydration and classic status. Elizabeth Taylor reportedly used Jergens products, and customer reviews praise the lotion's scent and effectiveness.

articles.title: 20 Target Shoes You'll Wear Again And Again
articles.author: Lauren Barnhill
articles.summary: Target is introducing a variety of new shoe products suitable for fall, including suede clogs, sneakers, rain boots, heels, loafers, flats, Chelsea boots, Mary Jane flats, suede heels, cheetah-print sneakers, mini flat heels, knee-length boots, peep-toe heels, kitten heel sandals, cow-print flats, chunky sneakers, ankle boots, chop-out block heels, faux-leather kitten heels, and Western boots. These new offerings come in various sizes and colors, feature memory foam insoles for comfort, and range in price from $20 to $58.

articles.title: ASOS rolls out huge change to its app â€“ and it's perfect for shoppers who ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: ASOS has launched ASOS Live, a new immersive video shopping experience, within its app. This new service aims to integrate video and creator-led content to enhance the shopping experience for customers.

articles.title: Meghan Markle fans left baffled over huge surprise fans sat 'love this'
articles.author: Matt Lloyd
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand 'As Ever' has launched a new product: a Sauvignon Blanc wine, which is immediately available for purchase on asever.com. This launch coincides with the return of her Apricot Spread and Orange Marmalade and the wine is imported from New Zealand.

articles.title: Merriam-Webster trolls the entire internet, rolls out an update that â€˜never hallucinates'
articles.author: Jorge Aguilar
articles.summary: Merriam-Webster is launching the 12th edition of its Collegiate Dictionary on November 18, 2025, featuring over 5,000 new words and 1,000 new phrases and idioms, including contemporary terms. The new edition includes enhancements to existing entries and adds over 20,000 usage examples.

articles.title: Amazon Breaks Record by Selling the Latest Android Tablet at Premium Price
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Amazon launched the 'NovaTab X,' a premium Android tablet priced at $899, and has achieved record sales. The NovaTab X features a 12.4-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, up to 16GB RAM, and S Pen support, targeting the high-end tablet market and competing with the iPad Pro.

articles.title: âš¡Know Expected OnePlus 15 China and India Launch Date, Specs and Features
articles.summary: OnePlus is preparing to launch its new flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 15, in China, India, and globally. The OnePlus 15 may feature a new design and a high-refresh-rate display, and will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 mobile processor. A Sand Storm variant has been teased for the India launch.

articles.title: Meta VP: AI is the best thing in advertising â€“ if we use it right
articles.author: Derya Matras
articles.summary: Freshscarfs, an Istanbul-based start-up, used AI to improve ad campaign efficiency for promoting its range of modern hijabs and accessories. adQuadrant integrated AI branding tools which elevated their creative output by enabling quicker ad experimentation. These implementations demonstrate how AI is being used to introduce new functionalities and efficiencies into business operations.

articles.title: A Fair Shot for the Trump Phone
articles.author: Daniel R. Suhr
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched the T1 Phone, aiming to offer an alternative to established players. However, the new product faces hurdles due to Apple's restrictive ecosystem, which limits consumer choice and data portability. The Trump administration's Department of Justice is pursuing an antitrust lawsuit against Apple, alleging anticompetitive practices, to create a more level playing field for new entrants like Trump Mobile.

articles.title: Alibaba's Amap reaches 400 million users, fueled by new AI feature
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Alibaba Group Holding launched Amap Street Stars, a destination ranking feature within its Amap (Gaode) application, on September 10, which utilizes AI. In response, Meituan announced plans to use AI models to screen consumer reviews and launch high-quality food delivery services.

articles.title: 42 Alternatives To Expensive Products If You Have Michelin Star Taste But A McDonald's Budget
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of affordable product alternatives to expensive brands like Lululemon, Skims, and Aritzia. These include leggings, activewear, and loungewear, providing similar styles and materials at a fraction of the cost, offering budget-conscious consumers comparable quality and aesthetics.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers horrified by Â£9.99 Halloween buy that looks like it says something VERY different
articles.summary: Lidl is selling a 'Trick or Treat' neon sign for Halloween, priced at Â£11.99 or Â£9.99 for Lidl Club members.  The sign, intended to add a spooky glow to Halloween parties, has been met with amusement as some shoppers misinterpret the cursive text as saying something else.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers horrified by Â£9.99 Halloween buy that looks like it says something VERY different
articles.summary: Lidl introduced a Halloween-themed neon sign that says 'Trick or Treat'. The sign costs Â£11.99 or Â£9.99 for Lidl Club members and is intended to add a spooky glow to Halloween parties. However, customers have misinterpreted the cursive writing on the sign.

articles.title: Prime Day Extravaganza: UWANT D100 Wet & Dry Vacuum Cleaner Launches with Exclusive Deals on Amazon
articles.author: UWANT
articles.summary: UWANT D100 Wet & Dry Vacuum Cleaner is available at a special promotional price on Amazon during Amazon Prime Day. The D100 is designed to handle wet and dry messes and addresses unpleasant odors, delivering a fresh home environment.

articles.title: Oppo F31 Pro+ review: Endurance monster with quirky design
articles.author: Ajay Hanje
articles.summary: The Oppo F31 Pro+ smartphone features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, a 7,000mAh battery with 80W charging, and a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset. It is priced at Rs 32,999 and is marketed for its long-lasting battery and unique design.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Lite listed on Amazon India website ahead of launch, will be powered by a 5000mAh battery
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Bold N1 Lite smartphone in India, which has been listed on Amazon India. The smartphone will feature a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a UniSoc octa-core processor with 3GB of RAM, 64GB of storage, a 13MP dual camera, and a 5000mAh battery.

articles.title: Voices: Dyson is in trouble â€“ but not for the reason you might think...
articles.author: James Moore
articles.summary: Dyson is introducing new cleaning and robotic technologies, alongside reinvented versions of its hair dryer and vacuum cleaner. The company filed 238 patents to protect these innovations, despite facing a nearly 50% revenue decline last year and citing slower economic growth and reduced consumer confidence as challenges.

articles.title: Lava Bold N1 Lite Listed on Amazon Ahead of Official Launch in India
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Lava is launching the Bold N1 Lite smartphone in India. The phone features a 6.75-inch HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate and is listed on Amazon ahead of its official release. The phone is listed with an unspecified UniSoc

articles.title: Motorola teases Edge 70 Pro, aims to take on iPhone Air and Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Edge 70 Pro, a very slim smartphone potentially rivaling Apple and Samsung flagships. Leaks highlight its sub-6mm profile and a 50MP camera with OIS and a wide field-of-view lens. The phone may also feature a dedicated AI button.

articles.title: AMP Pages & Their Impact on your website's overall SEO
articles.summary: Google introduced Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) in 2015 to accelerate website loading speed on mobile devices. AMP is compatible with platforms like WordPress and Shopify. Google promotes AMP, as speed is more important than flashy features, and it continues to be a dependable tool in 2025.

articles.title: Dyson is in trouble â€“ but not for the reason you might think...
articles.author: James Moore
articles.summary: Dyson's revenue fell by nearly 50%, despite 'record volumes' of products being sold and filing 238 patents aimed at 'protecting new innovations globally.' Dyson is banking on 'new wet and dry floor cleaning technology, robotic technology and purification technology, as well as complete reinventions of their hair dryer and vacuum cleaner formats' to reverse this trend, facing slower economic growth and reduced consumer confidence.

articles.title: Hoover sale cuts Â£100 off cordless vacuum and mop in one
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Hoover has reduced the price of its Cordless Vacuum Cleaner & Mop With Anti Hair Wrap (HF4 Hydro Pet model) to Â£219. This device combines vacuuming and mopping with features like anti-hair wrap, a hydro nozzle, and washable mop pads. Customer reviews highlight its effectiveness in cleaning pet hair and its convenience as a time-saving cleaning solution.

articles.title: Meghan Markle unveils new product as fans spot major surprise
articles.author: Lauren Welch
articles.summary: As Ever has launched a new product, a Sauvignon Blanc wine, which is now available on their website. The wine is imported from Marlborough in New Zealand. This product joins others since the brand's launch in March.

articles.title: Au dÃ©filÃ© Victoria Beckham, l'adolescente devient adulte
articles.author: AdÃ¨le Bari
articles.summary: An apparel company aims to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. To do so, it partners with an agency to create profiles of young, affluent parents likely to purchase these clothes. These profiles will then be utilized to present targeted advertising within partner apps, thereby introducing the new product line to a specific demographic.

articles.title: ðŸŒ± Patch AM: New Brunch Spot First Watch Opens In Bergen County Next Week
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: First Watch is opening a new brunch spot in Paramus next week. The restaurant will feature a chef-inspired menu with fresh ingredients and offer unlimited coffee during the opening week. Spirit Christmas is expanding its holiday pop-up shops in New Jersey, including a new location in Paramus.

articles.title: Secrets of Dyson: ALICE BEER visits its gadget-laden HQ to try out the products of tomorrow
articles.author: ALICE BEER
articles.summary: Dyson recently launched the PencilVac 15067795 in the East, a redesigned vacuum with innovative features. The company is also preparing to launch the Dyson Spot and Scrub AI, a robot vacuum equipped with object recognition. Moreover, Dyson has introduced its initial cosmetic hair range, incorporating sunflower oil sourced from their own farmland.

articles.title: Review: Ultenic T20 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Mop made such an impression I ended up naming it!
articles.author: Steve Wollaston
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the T20 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Mop, which is AI-powered and compact. The device maps the layout of the house, avoids obstacles, and can be controlled via an app to schedule cleans, control suction levels, and choose between mopping, vacuuming, or both. It is available on Amazon for Â£289.99.

articles.title: Tech Review: The robot hoover that made such an impression I ended up naming it
articles.author: Daniel Smith
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the T20 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Mop, available on Amazon for Â£289.99. The robot vacuum is AI-powered, featuring a collision detector, scheduling cleans and smart mapping functions via an app. The robot is suitable for all floors and combines vacuuming and floor washing in a single step.

articles.title: Mark Cuban hails Elon Musk: He is ahead of the curve, but not betting big on humanoidsÃ¢Â€Â”hereÃ¢Â€Â™s why
articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.summary: Mark Cuban's company, Cost Plus Drugs, uses AI-powered robotics in their manufacturing process, producing medicines faster and cheaper than in India or China. Cuban also highlighted AIÃ¢Â€Â™s potential to help small businesses improve efficiency.

articles.title: Creative genius on display: This week's must-watch advertising masterpieces
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Godrej Appliances promoted a new appliance, and Scapia advertised its travel-related service through recent advertising campaigns. These campaigns aimed to capture attention and redefine their respective categories.

articles.title: IPO woes: Can LED face masks and tinned tuna IPOs revitalise London?
articles.author: Maisie Grice
articles.summary: The Beauty Tech Group announced the successful pricing of its initial public offering and began trading. Princes confirmed its intention to register to float on the London Stock Exchange, with plans to expand its product range and enter the drinks market.  This represents new offerings or plans for expansion in the market for both companies.

articles.title: Belize to Launch National Brand to Boost Global Recognition
org: The Belize Trade and Investment Development Service
articles.summary: Belize, with funding from IDB, is launching a national brand encompassing an image and slogan, aimed at boosting global recognition and promoting tourism, trade, and investment. BELTRAIDE has launched a survey to gather local and international perceptions to define the national brand, with a rollout expected within six months.

articles.title: Xbox cloud gaming goes free? Microsoft tests ad-supported games without Game Pass
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft is preparing to launch an ad-supported version of Xbox Cloud Gaming, allowing users to stream games for free without a Game Pass subscription. The service, currently in internal testing, will be available on multiple platforms and will include preroll ads before gameplay with session limits. This announcement follows Xbox Cloud Gaming exiting beta and Game Pass Ultimate now supporting streaming in 1440p resolution.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 70 Unveiled: World's Thinnest Smartphone at Just Over 6 mm
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the Edge 70, a slim 5G smartphone measuring 6.08mm thick. The Edge 70 features a 6.55-inch pOLED display with a 144Hz refresh rate and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 778G+ 5G Mobile Platform. It also features a 50MP main camera with OIS and runs on a near-stock version of Android 13.

articles.title: Aspira Addresses Evolving Laundry Needs with New Product Launch
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Limited has launched Viva Matic, a new detergent formulated for washing machines, in response to the increasing adoption of automated laundry solutions in Nigerian households. The product aims to provide efficiency and convenience, ensuring clothes are cleaner, fresher, and protected wash after wash while saving time and resources.

articles.title: Aspira launches Viva Matic for smarter laundry care
articles.author: Anthony
articles.summary: Aspira Nigeria Limited has launched Viva Matic, a high-performance detergent designed for washing machines. The company states that Viva Matic dissolves quickly, tackles stains, preserves colors, and extends the life of clothes and washing machines. It is formulated to work in both front-load and top-load washing machines.

articles.title: Empowering Startups with Global Talent: All Talentz Revolutionizes Outsourcing Solutions
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: All Talentz introduces a platform designed to revolutionize outsourcing solutions for startups. The platform provides services, including software development, digital marketing, design, virtual assistant services, and data science & analytics, aiming to accelerate project completion and provide access to specialized skills. This allows startups to scale teams and focus on core competencies.

articles.title: Yahoo! JAPAN: Content Writer for EEA and UK Customers, Serving Only Requested Content Without Commentary
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Yahoo! JAPAN requires a specialized approach to content creation, particularly for e-commerce product descriptions, which should focus on technical specifications, features, and benefits without subjective claims. A case study highlighted a global electronics manufacturer's marketing campaign for a new smartphone that underperformed due to emotionally driven copy and aspirational imagery. A revised campaign, focused on technical specifications presented in a clear and objective manner, improved performance.

articles.title: Tired Of Unwieldy ERP Systems, This Duo Created Their Ownâ€”And Just Raised $90 Million
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Dual Entry introduces a new, AI-powered alternative to conventional, cloud-based ERPs.

articles.title: Sky Mobile and giffgaff rivalled by lesser-known ï¿½5 phone provider
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Spusu, a new mobile provider, has entered the UK market. The company is offering affordable SIM-only deals to compete with established brands.

articles.title: Innovation key growth driver in skincare mkt
articles.author: ZHU WENQIAN
articles.summary: Huaxizi (Florasis), a Chinese beauty brand, introduced its skincare line in September, responding to growing consumer demand. The new skincare product range includes face creams, essences, toners, lotions, and facial masks, available through both online and offline channels. This launch is part of a broader trend in China's skincare market, driven by innovation in cosmetic ingredients and changing consumer preferences.

articles.title: AI 'Friend' Startup Overwhelmed With Hatred
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: AI startup Friend launched a new pendant designed to listen to the user and send AI-generated texts. The product launch has been met with controversy, leading to the defacement of subway ads promoting the device.
